name: Soul Harvest (itch) (twilightrh)
description:
Achievements Demon Slayer

             Kill 50 Red Demons without losing health

Armored Slayer

             Kill 50 Armored Red Demons without losing health

Gunner Slayer

             Kill 50 Pirate Gunners without losing health

Dragon Slayer

             Kill 50 Dragons without losing health

Beat Game

             Defeat the final boss

Secret

            Shh... its a secret

This is an entry to the Ludum Dare 52 Jam Competition
